name: Super Birbo 4.1
description:
ITA

Gioco in accesso anticipato

Ogni riferimento a persone esistenti, o realmente esistite, è puramente casuale

Tastiera:

"Frecce direzionali o WASD" per muoversi

"Spazio" per saltare

"E o M" per lanciare il mattone

"ESC o P" per mettere in pausa

EN

Game in early access

Any resemblance to real persons, living or dead, is purely coincidental

Credits and licensing information are inside the game

Keyboard:

"WASD or arrow keys" - to move

"Spacebar" - to jump

"E or M" - to throw the brick

"Escape or P" - to pause

Why is there no English language?

The game contents are satirical and addressed to a specific Italian online community.
